page.title: 19COMMUNICATIONS,LICKEY
page.content: {SURVEY NO.1: SCHOOLCHILDREN We surveyed a selection of 26 pupils from Lickey First and Middle School. Here are the results: 14 people had a video, 9 people had a teletext, 25 people had a telephone, 26 had a radio,television and newspaper and 21 had their paper delivered. {SURVEY NO.2: ADULTS We also conducted a survey in the street.We interviewed 10 people.5 were OAP's and 5 were people below the age of 50.These were the results: 10 had a radio,television,newspaper and telephone. Only those below 50 had a video and teletext. The older people seem not to have a need for this modern technology.
